ygData.subject: pet experience
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I got this tidbit from the only actual research I ve seen: http://x34.deja.com/getdoc.xp?AN=554690996 ... That s how I read it - that taking damage leads
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 28 Dec 1999, Dave Karpman wrote:

> Are you saying you HAVE to do over half the damage to get the max
> experience? I have never ever heard of this, and it has not been my
> experience after months of playing this game.

I got this tidbit from the only actual research I've seen:
http://x34.deja.com/getdoc.xp?AN=554690996

> Or, are you saying that the bard has to do a little damage to you to get
> the max. ep? If so, that is another new one on me.

That's how I read it - that taking damage leads to increased xp. More
research indicated, as that's the first I'd heard as well.
--
Mark Rafn dagon@... <http://www.dagon.net/> !G
